result.execSummary:
Michael R. Bush was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Michael R. Bush was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael R. Bush

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: Nikki. 
Case Called: 2:52pm.
State appears by ADA Hannah Boeck. Defendant appears in person, in custody, and with Atty Chad Shamali.

Atty Shamali notes deft wishes to waive extradition. 
COURT questions deft as to extradation waiver.
COURT finds waiver is made freely and voluntarily.
Deft signs extradition waiver in front of COURT.

Adjourned: 2:56pm.

Clerk: Nikki. 
Case Called: 2:45pm.
State appears by ADA Hannah Boeck. Defendant appears via Zoom, in custody, and with Atty Chad Shamali.
VCRW.
Reading Waived. Reserve Jurisdiction.
Court questions defendant re: complaint and rights.
Prelim Time Limits Preserved.

Atty Shamali requesting an extradition hearing.
State to proceed with a governor's warrant.
COURT makes findings; 
COURT continues $53,000.00 cash bond from Illinois.

CONDITIONS:
-No other non-monetary conditions.

DATES:
CC: 4/7 @8:05am.

Adjourned: 2:51pm.

Clerk: Nikki. 
Case Called: 2:46pm.
State appears by ADA Hannah Boeck. Defendant appears via Zoom, in custody, and with Atty Chad Shamali.
VCRW.

Deft on extradition warrant.
COURT finds probable cause to hold deft.

BOND:
$53,000.00 cash.

COURT to recall case tomorrow for MCJ to supply proper paperwork to deft prior to hearing.

Adjourned: 2:49pm.
